languages.text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, бывший дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, сошел с назначенного ему пути и отрекся от Святой Инквизиции во имя того, чтобы быть рядом со своей возлюбленной. До сих пор историографы не могут сойтись во мнении, что стало тому причиной: изъян характера, потаенная скверна, отравившая душу некогда верного имперца... или же глубочайшее чувство, неведомое ограниченным служителям Бога-Императора.

Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?
languages.original_text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, бывший дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, сошел с назначенного ему пути и отрекся от Святой Инквизиции во имя того, чтобы быть рядом со своей возлюбленной. До сих пор историографы не могут сойтись во мнении, что стало тому причиной: изъян характера, потаенная скверна, отравившая душу некогда верного имперца... или же глубочайшее чувство, неведомое ограниченным служителям Бога-Императора.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path allotted to him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of being with his beloved. Annalists to this day cannot agree on the reason for this betrayal: a flaw in his character, hidden corruption, that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium... or the deepest feeling, unbeknown to the numb servants of the God-Emperor.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path allotted to him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in the name of being with his beloved. Annalists to this day cannot agree on the reason for this betrayal: a flaw in his character, hidden corruption, that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium... or the deepest feeling, unbeknown to the numb servants of the God-Emperor.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path prescribed to him and denounced the Holy Inquisition to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? A hidden corruption that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it the deepest of feelings that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend?

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path prescribed to him and denounced the Holy Inquisition to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? A hidden corruption that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it the deepest of feelings that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend?

Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

languages.text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的前任审讯官。为了留在深爱之人的身边，他偏离了他原本规划好的道路，背弃了神圣审判庭。时至今日，史学家依然无法就海因里希背叛的原因达成共识：是他的性格存在缺陷？还是某种潜在的污点，毒害了曾经忠诚的帝国臣民的灵魂？又或者说，他的背叛出于某种极为深刻的个人感情，但神皇麻木的仆人们却永远无法理解？
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

traits.locale_text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的前任审讯官。为了留在深爱之人的身边，他偏离了他原本规划好的道路，背弃了神圣审判庭。时至今日，史学家依然无法就海因里希背叛的原因达成共识：是他的性格存在缺陷？还是某种潜在的腐化，毒害了曾经忠诚的帝国臣民的灵魂？又或者说，他的背叛出于某种极为深刻的感情，但神皇麻木的仆人们却永远无法理解？

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, der ehemalige Interrogator des Ordo Xenos, verließ den ihm vorgeschriebenen Pfad und schwor der Heiligen Inquisition ab, um bei {mf|seinem|seiner} Geliebten zu bleiben. Noch heute sind Chronisten sich nicht einig, was seinen Verrat ausgelöst hatte: War es ein Makel in seinem Charakter? Eine verborgene Verderbnis, welche die Seele des einst so treuen Dieners des Imperiums vergiftet hatte? Oder war es ein derart tiefes Gefühl, dass die betäubten Diener des Gottimperators es niemals verstehen könnten?
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, der ehemalige Interrogator des Ordo Xenos, verließ den ihm vorgeschriebenen Pfad und schwor der Heiligen Inquisition ab, um bei {mf|seinem|seiner} Geliebten zu bleiben. Noch heute sind Chronisten sich nicht einig, was seinen Verrat ausgelöst hatte: War es ein Makel in seinem Charakter? Eine verborgene Verderbnis, welche die Seele des einst so treuen Dieners des Imperiums vergiftet hatte? Oder das tiefste Gefühl, welches die betäubten Diener des Gottimperators niemals verstehen könnten?

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, ancien interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, quitta la voie qui lui était destinée et renia la Sainte Inquisition afin de rester aux côtés de sa bien-aimée. Aujourd'hui encore, les chroniqueurs sont incapables de comprendre la raison de sa trahison : s'agissait-il d'une faiblesse de caractère ? D'une corruption bien dissimulée qui aurait empoisonné l'âme de ce sujet si fidèle à l'Imperium ? Ou de sentiments trop profonds pour être compris par les serviteurs insensibles de l'Empereur-Dieu ?
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, ancien interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, quitta la voie toute tracée qui s'offrait à lui et renia la Sainte Inquisition afin de rester aux côtés de sa bien-aimée. Encore aujourd'hui, les chroniqueurs sont incapables de comprendre la raison de sa trahison : s'agissait-il d'une faiblesse de caractère ? D'une corruption bien dissimulée qui aurait empoisonné l'âme de ce sujet si fidèle à l'Imperium ? Ou tout simplement de sentiments trop profonds pour être compris par les serviteurs insensibles de l'Empereur-Dieu ?

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, antiguo interrogador del Ordo Xenos, abandonó el camino preparado para él y renunció a la Santa Inquisición para estar con su amada. Incluso hoy en día, los cronistas son incapaces de determinar el motivo de su traición: ¿fue un defecto en su personalidad? ¿Una corrupción oculta que envenenó el alma de un súbdito leal del Imperium? ¿O acaso fue consecuencia de un sentimiento tan profundo que los sirvientes insensibilizados del Dios Emperador nunca podrían comprender?
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, antiguo interrogador del Ordo Xenos, abandonó el camino preparado para él y renunció a la Santa Inquisición para estar con su amada. Incluso hoy en día, los cronistas son incapaces de determinar el motivo de su traición: ¿fue un defecto en su personalidad? ¿Una corrupción oculta que envenenó el alma de un súbdito leal del Imperium? ¿O acaso fue consecuencia de un sentimiento tan profundo que los sirvientes insensibilizados del Dios Emperador nunca podrían comprender?

languages.text: 〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、愛する人と生きるために、自分に定められた道を捨て、聖なる異端審問庁を放棄した。歴史の編纂者たちの間では、この裏切りの理由について今も見解が一致していない。これは、彼の性格的欠陥によるものなのか。帝国の忠実な臣民だった男の魂が、密かに堕落に毒されていたのか。はたまた、神帝陛下の鈍磨な従者には理解できないほど深遠な感情があったのだろうか。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

traits.locale_text: 〈純血の団〉のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、下命を打ちやり、愛する人と生きるために聖なる異端審問庁を糾弾した。歴史の編纂者たちの間では、この裏切りの理由について今も見解が一致していない。これは、彼の性格的欠陥によるものなのか。帝国の忠実な臣民だった男の魂が、密かに堕落に毒されていたのか。はたまた、神帝陛下の鈍磨な従者にはうかがい知れぬ、何よりも深遠な感情があったのだろうか。

languages.text: Zeno Nizamı eski Sorgucu'su Heinrix Van Calox, âşığıyla kalabilmek için onun için çizilmiş olan yolu terk etti ve Kutsal Engizisyon'u reddetti. Vakanüvisler bugüne değin hâlâ ihanetinin sebebi konusunda uzlaşabilmiş değiller: Karakterindeki bir kusur muydu? İmparatorluk'un inançlı bir hizmetkârının ruhunu zehirleyen gizli bir bozukluk muydu? Yoksa Tanrı İmparator'un hissiz hizmetkârlarının algılayamayacağı kadar yoğun bir duygu türü müydü?
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, left the path ordained for him and denounced the Holy Inquisition in order to remain with his beloved. Chroniclers to this day cannot agree on the reason for his betrayal: was it a flaw in his character? Some hidden taint that poisoned the soul of a once faithful subject of the Imperium? Or was it a sentiment so profound that the God-Emperor's numb servants could never comprehend it?

Vakanüvisler bugüne değin hâlâ ihanetinin sebebi konusunda uzlaşabilmiş değiller: Karakterindeki bir kusur muydu? İmparatorluk'un inançlı bir hizmetkârının ruhunu zehirleyen gizli bir bozukluk muydu? Yoksa Tanrı İmparator'un hissiz hizmetkârlarının algılayamayacağı kadar yoğun bir duygu türü müydü?
